name: Ursa Hunter - Kodiak Attack
description:
Basically every man is to conquer, to hunt and never be prey. The first rule of life is survival, stay alive and fight. By evolution we have come to the point that people are rarer, we are homo sapiens and as such we need to create everything.
We create games in which the need for domination and heroism can be easily satisfied. So the virtual world can compensate the real world. Lively games, lived a virtual world, some of the archaic needs of man remain in this world.
Our virtual world has three spaces:The ice forest of Alaska, The Mexican green canyon, The hot valley of California. There are diffrenet hunters who attack bears, but they fight each other also, because of the desire for personal triumph. Each bear that is shot down brings a trophy in the form of honey. Let's try to win as many trophies as possible and let's sweeten ourselves with honey! Let's shoot weapons, change and improve our experience!
Types of bears: American black bear, Asian black bear, Giant panda, Sun bear, Polar bear,Ursid hybrid, Sloth, Spectacled bear and Brown bear. The grizzly bear is a large subspecies of brown bear inhabiting North America, other popular specises of brown bears are Gobi, Kodiak, European, Blue, Atlas etc.
In real life, let's keep safe every animal and every man!
Let's play in the games!
